Title: Prohibits religious discrimination in recreational water parks
Summary: Prohibits the discrimination of persons based on their religious attire in recreational water parks, including, but not limited to, beaches, lakes, pools and other water facilities operated on land or water for recreational use.
LawCode: Add ยง40-h, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to prohibiting discrimination in recreational water parks due to religious attire
